comments.body: Consider making `v15` and `v0.20.0-alpha11` templated parametrers (like `heapster_memory`) so we only need to change it in 1 place

That will lead to more salt ***... The version numbers will be eliminated
once we move to deployments.

On Thu, Mar 3, 2016 at 5:13 PM, Tim St. Clair notifications@github.com
wrote:

> In cluster/addons/cluster-monitoring/influxdb/heapster-controller.yaml
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/22492#discussion_r54977218
> :
> 
> >    namespace: kube-system
> >    labels:
> >      k8s-app: heapster
> > -    version: v14
> > -    version: v15
> 
> Consider making v15 and v0.20.0-alpha11 templated parametrers (like
> heapster_memory) so we only need to change it in 1 place
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/22492/files#r54977218.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@  labels:
    k8s-app: heapster
    version: v15
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
spec:

@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@metadata:
  name: heapster-v14
  namespace: kube-system
  labels:
    k8s-app: heapster
